extDesc.message: Fear & Greed radar with multi-timeframe risk analysis.

extremesDesc.message: Distance from neutral zone (50). Shows how emotional the market is.

tfSpreadDesc.message: Difference between Fear & Greed zones across timeframes.

impulseDesc.message: How sharply short timeframe deviates from higher ones.

autoRefreshHint.message: Auto refresh on pair change / every N seconds.

errNoSymbol.message: Cannot detect symbol from URL on this page.

help_detectedPair.message: Detected pair shows the exchange and the trading pair detected from the active tab (e.g. BINANCE:BTCUSDT).

help_fng_range.message: Fear & Greed is a sentiment index from 0 to 100 for each timeframe.

help_zones.message: Zones: 0–25 Extreme Fear · 25–45 Fear · 45–55 Neutral · 55–76 Greed · 76–100 Extreme Greed

help_risk_title.message: Risk (0–100) is an instability index — NOT a buy or sell signal. It shows how dangerous the current state is.

help_risk_levels.message: Levels: LOW calm · MEDIUM unstable · HIGH turbulent · EXTREME extreme / chaotic

help_market_tilt.message: • Market Tilt — average sentiment across all timeframes.

help_tf_spread.message: • TF Spread — how strongly timeframes disagree.

help_extremes.message: • Extremes (E) — distance from the neutral zone 50.

help_tip.message: Tip: if the symbol is not detected, open a chart or trading page with the symbol in the URL and click Refresh.

apiKeyHint.message: Paste the key from your account dashboard.
